[Beina's Head](/beinasHead/) (upon death) |body = Nomad's Brigandine |waist = Girdle of Eoten Constitution (Deadfire){{!}}Girdle of Eoten Constitution |weapon1 = Superb Mace (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Mace |weapon1_offhand = Exceptional Medium Shield (Round) (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Medium Shield (Round) |internalname = CHA_Bounty_Mystic |guid = f427274e-2710-4d53-b60e-001247593efd }} '''Beina''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Beina, a dwarf mystic responsible for conning or killing anyone who gets too close. There's a handsome bounty on her head. Beina sounds like the type to keep moving, but she's been seen tarrying around an island southwest of Hasongo. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved =[Bounty - Beina](/bountyBeina/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Bounty - Beina](/bountyBeina/): Is the target of the bounty.
